scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
scripts.docker:start:mac: docker-machine stop default && docker-machine start default && docker-machine env default && eval $(docker-machine env default) && docker-machine ip default
